Desc.entry: Provides support for people in Burngreave, Pitsmoor and Shirecliffe for community environmental action, advice and loan of tools. Offers information on and liaises with other bodies. Holds an Environment Day in May/June. Is currently setting up the School For vegetables to provide training and support for those wanting to grow their own food. Involved in Abbeyfield Park and other green spaces in North Sheffield. Company limited by guarantee no 3455896.
